detectors.description:
balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ImperialCoin.sol#33)
	- StandardToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ImperialCoin.sol#63-65)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ImperialCoin.sol#50-57)
	- Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ImperialCoin.sol#34)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ImperialCoin.sol#104-106)
	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ImperialCoin.sol#35)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ImperialCoin.sol#37)
	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ImperialCoin.sol#93-97)
